_B5Dj8PL4E0.title: Maxam–Gilbert DNA Sequencing Method Animation
_B5Dj8PL4E0.author: Biology with Animations
_B5Dj8PL4E0.description:
I make animations in biology with PowerPoint, this animation video is about Maxam–Gilbert DNA sequencing method, which based on nucleobase-specific partial chemical modification of DNA and subsequent cleavage of the DNA backbone at sites adjacent to the modified nucleotides.

PCR can be used previously to amplify the DNA.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

if you like this animation video hit like and subscribe for more.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
